fr.sorbonne_u.components

Interface ComponentI.ComponentService<V>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.Callable<V>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractComponent.AbstractService
    Enclosing interface:
    ComponentI

    public static interface ComponentI.ComponentService<V>
extends java.util.concurrent.Callable<V>
    The interface ComponentService is meant to group under a same interface all of the requests that return results for this component.

    Description

    As the Java Executor framework use Callable and Runnable, this interface is meant to be used to implement the callable tasks representing requests to this component services.

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2012-06-12

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AbstractComponent getServiceOwner()
      return the reference to the component owner of the executor service that will execute this service call.
      java.lang.Object getServiceProviderReference()
      return the reference to the component owner or its plug-in that will execute this request.
      void setOwnerReference(ComponentI owner)
      sets a reference to the owner component that can be used in the code of the request to access its services.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.util.concurrent.Callable

        call

      • setOwnerReference

        void setOwnerReference(ComponentI owner)
        sets a reference to the owner component that can be used in the code of the request to access its services.

        Contract

         pre    owner != null
 post   true                    // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        owner - the component owner of the executor service that will execute this task.
